name: 陳偉堯
objective: 本課程將作為大一學生入學後第一門程式語言奠基課程，旨在提供學生們了解程式設計的基礎，並探索其與人工智慧的關聯。除了傳授基本的程式設計概念外，我們還將探討人工智慧在程式設計中的應用與意義。課程內容將包括電腦運作概念、程式設計原則、分支敘述、迴圈敘述、輸出輸入敘述、陣列處理、字元處理以及子程式等關鍵課題。同時，我們將特別強調人工智慧對於程式設計的重要性，以及它如何影響我們如何思考、解決問題和開發軟體。透過本課程的學習，學生們將能夠建立堅實的程式設計基礎，並了解人工智慧在這個領域中的關鍵作用。
schedule:
Week 01: Chapter 1 Binary and decimal numbers
Week 02: Chapter 2 basic elements of Fortran (variables)
Week 03: Chapter 2 basic elements of Fortran (statements)
Week 04: Chapter 3 branching structures (if/then/else)
Week 05: Chapter 3 branching structures (switch)
Week 06: First exam
Week 07: Chapter 4 loops (do loop)
Week 08: Chapter 4 loops (while loop)
Week 09: Chapter 5 file input
Week 10: Chapter 5 file output
Week 11: Chapter 6 arrays
Week 12: Second Exam
Week 13: Introduction to ChatGPT: Basics and Applications
Week 14: Chapter 7 procedures
Week 15: Using ChatGPT for Fortran programming assistance
Week 16: Chapter 7 procedures and advanced ChatGPT usage
Week 17: Review and practical applications of ChatGPT in programming
Week 18: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Homework and attendance: 50%
Exam #1: 15% (programming test)
Exam #2: 15% (programming test)
Final Exam: 20% (comprehensive programming test)
materials: Chapman, S. J. (2018). Fortran for Scientists and Engineers, Fourth edition, McGraw Hill, 1024 pages, ISBN: 978-1-260-08417-7
consultation: 請寫電子郵件向授課教師諮詢，或約時間於辦公室當面諮詢。
